page.title: 14Amusements in Sheerness
page.content: Due to the effects of{tourism}in Sheerness there is a selection of privately owned amusement arcades, snooker clubs, discotheques and bingo. They are located either on the sea front or near the town centre. There are two{amusement arcades by the sea whose facilites include video games, bingo and pinball machines. They also sell ice cream and have a snack bar. Opposite these is one of the two snooker clubs. Both are for members only and are open throughout the year. The second snooker club is part of the{entertainments}complex which includes a cinema and{discotheque.}The latter caters for both locals and seamen. The large bingo hall is housed in a converted cinema. It is open nightly.
